name: RSSFeed
description: This plugin serves as an RSS subscription service for Mattermost.

settings.display_name: Time window between RSS feed checks (minutes).
settings.help_text: This is used to set a timer for the system to know when to go check to see if there is any new data in the subscribed rss feeds.  Defaults to 15 minutes.
(Optional) If enabled, the title of posts will be formatted in bold.
(Optional) Use this field to hide the description in rss post (Useful if link already returns a valid link back to post).
(Optional) Use this field to hide the summary in Atom post (Useful if link already returns a valid link back to post).
(Optional) Specify, whether the content of an Atom feed should be posted.
(Optional) Specify, whether the link of an RSS feed should be posted.
(Optional) Specify, whether the Link of an Atom feed should be posted.
(Optional) Specify, whether the title of an RSS feed should be posted.
(Optional) Specify, whether the title of an Atom feed should be posted.
